title: Responsive Multimodal Oral Presentation Skills Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic math pedagogy and experience with online education platforms
context.additional_context: Short intensive course for pre-service/in-service secondary mathematics teachers to acquire effective oral presentation skills using multimodal resources

learning_goals: Learners can integrate verbal and non-verbal expressions (visual aids, gestures, vocal modulation) when explaining mathematical concepts.
Learners can adjust presentation strategies in real-time according to teacher-student interaction principles.
Learners can create presentation materials using digital tools (whiteboards, screen sharing, real-time polls) in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
